testcase.name: creates a QueryClient with defaults
merges custom configuration
default refetchOnWindowFocus is false
retry function avoids retrying 4xx errors
staleTime default is reasonable (>0)

testcase.classname: Product CRUD + Search using useAppQuery / useMutation
testcase.name: READ: fetches and returns product list

testcase.classname: Product CRUD + Search using useAppQuery / useMutation
testcase.name: SEARCH: returns filtered results by title (case-insensitive)

testcase.classname: Product CRUD + Search using useAppQuery / useMutation
testcase.name: SEARCH: returns empty results when none match

testcase.classname: Product CRUD + Search using useAppQuery / useMutation
testcase.name: CREATE: POST adds a product and list is refetched to include it

testcase.classname: Product CRUD + Search using useAppQuery / useMutation
testcase.name: UPDATE: PUT updates a product and list reflects change

testcase.classname: Product CRUD + Search using useAppQuery / useMutation
testcase.name: DELETE: DELETE removes a product from the list after refetch

testcase.classname: Product CRUD + Search using useAppQuery / useMutation
testcase.name: CREATE error triggers onError

testcase.classname: Product CRUD + Search using useAppQuery / useMutation
testcase.name: DEDUP: concurrent readers with same key perform a single network call

testcase.name: STALENESS: staleTime prevents immediate refetch on a second subscriber
component renders successfully with minimum required props
correct theme class applied - "ag-theme-alpine" present in the DOM
custom className appended correctly alongside the default theme class
AgGridReact component is rendered as a child
empty state handling - renders correctly when rowData is an empty array
empty columnDefs array - component behavior
mismatched column fields - columnDefs field doesn't exist in rowData
invalid height/width values (negative numbers, invalid strings) should not crash
very long cell content - text renders fully
special characters and duplicate row data handled properly
pagination enabled when pagination prop is true
pagination disabled when pagination prop is false or undefined
pagination controls render correctly when enabled
pagination respects paginationPageSize
pagination page size selector honors true mapping
large dataset (1000+ rows) renders without errors
single row of data displays correctly
dynamic data updates - rowData changes trigger re-render
column definition changes - columnDefs updates reflect in table
null/undefined values in rowData handled gracefully
columnDefs passed correctly to AgGridReact (headers show)
rowData passed correctly to AgGridReact and rows display
default height (500) applied when not specified
custom height overrides default (pixels, percentages, auto)
default width (100%) applied and custom width overrides
domLayout="autoHeight" is always set on AgGridReact
rest props spread correctly to AgGridReact (test with rowSelection)
onRowClicked callback triggers when a row is clicked
event object passed to onRowClicked contains correct row data
multiple row clicks handled correctly
optional callback - component works when onRowClicked is not provided
onSelectionChanged callback triggers and contains selected rows
